JsonSchemaFile.description: The `JsonSchemaFile` schema contains the properties that describe the locations, as URIs, of a Redfish schema definition that a Redfish service implements or references.
JsonSchemaFile.longDescription: This resource shall represent the schema file locator resource for a Redfish implementation.

title: #JsonSchemaFile.JsonSchemaFile
